value.title: How to use HTTP overrides on Azure CDN from Microsoft | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sohamn Chatterjee joins Scott Hanselman to show how to customize HTTP requests including header override, URL redirects/rewrites, and change caching policies using the rules engine for Azure CDN from Microsoft. You can add combinations of match conditions and actions per rule to do complex HTTP overrides

value.title: Learn all about Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), Part 1 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the core concepts of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). value.excerpt: Christina Lee joins Scott Hanselman to show what's new in Azure Cognitive Services.
